'''Over Sandstorms and Mirages (II)''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Sumeru: The Gilded Desert - Series II]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to unlock all [[Teleport Waypoint]]s in the [[Desert of Hadramaveth]].
